title: Using Wood in Less Developed Countries

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes why people in less developed countries use wood as a primary energy source?

choices.label: The infrastructure required to transport wood is well established.
Wood produces fewer carbon emissions than other energy sources, such as geothermal or natural gas.
Wood can be converted to peat and cheaply burned for fuel.
Wood, in the form of firewood and charcoal, is often readily available.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
